attributes.action: Ban Radical Islam in the UK
attributes.additional_details: Currently there is 2,660,116 Muslims living in the UK that is around the same number that America has, The whole of the UK is the size of 1 of America's states. That tells you something.
attributes.background: Banning radical Islam in the UK is the only thing we can do to save our country. Everyday Islam is injecting itself into our culture, our values and our lives. While I appreciate many Muslims are not radical it would be stupid to say that there isn't a lot of radical Muslims in the UK currently.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "radical Islam" in this context. The Government has the power to ban an organisation under the Terrorism Act 2000, if it believes that the organisation: 

- commits or participates in acts of terrorism;
- prepares for terrorism;
- promotes or encourages terrorism (including the unlawful glorification of terrorism); or
- is otherwise concerned in terrorism.

If there are specific groups that you think should be banned for these reasons, you could start a petition calling for that. 

You will also need to give your full name to start a petition.
